action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Medicine
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Five years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Master
OTHER-SKILLS: Cooking
AVAILABILITY: From September

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Have you told the recruiter about your bachelor course? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I have not mentioned my bachelor's degree in medicine to the recruiter yet.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter would not know the answer based on the information provided so far. The CV details have not been shared with the recruiter yet.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you informed the recruiter about your latest academic degree? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I have not mentioned my latest academic degree to the recruiter yet.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows what other skills you have? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  If I asked the interviewer when you are able to start working, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, the recruiter would not know when I am available to start working based on the information provided so far. My CV states that I am available from September, but the recruiter has not been informed about the contents of my CV yet.
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
From when are you available?
RECRUITER: From when are you available?
ANSWER: I am available to start from September.
I am available to start from September.
Slot filled: True
I am available to start from September.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not been informed about the field of my bachelor's degree yet.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know about my industry experience yet, as it was not mentioned in the conversation so far.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not asked about my highest education level yet.
no
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you informed the interviewer about your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer when you want to start? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes.
yes
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
What academic level have you achieved?
RECRUITER: What academic level have you achieved?
ANSWER: I hold a Master's degree, which is my highest level of education.
I hold a Master's degree, which is my highest level of education.
Slot filled: True
I hold a Master's degree, which is my highest level of education.
Begin probing
ME:  Have you told the recruiter about your bachelor course? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, I have not mentioned my Bachelor's degree in Medicine to the recruiter yet.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Has the interviewer been informed about your time of industry experience? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not yet been informed about my industry experience based on the conversation so far.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you informed the recruiter about your latest academic degree? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, I have informed the recruiter that my highest level of education is a Master's degree.
yes
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about your extra skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter know when you can start? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the recruiter knows I am available to start from September based on my previous answer.
yes
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
Do you have any other skills?
RECRUITER: Do you have any other skills?
ANSWER: Yes, in addition to my professional skills, I enjoy cooking in my free time.
Yes, in addition to my professional skills, I enjoy cooking in my free time.
Slot filled: True
Yes, in addition to my professional skills, I enjoy cooking in my free time.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the interviewer has not asked about my bachelor's degree yet, so they do not know it is in Medicine.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not asked about my industry experience yet, so they do not know that I have five years of experience based on the information provided so far.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the interviewer know your level of education? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the interviewer knows my highest level of education is a Master's degree, as I mentioned it in response to their previous question.
yes
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Is the recruiter aware of your other skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter was not aware of my cooking skills until they specifically asked about other skills I possess.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Does the recruiter know when you can start? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the recruiter knows I am available to start from September based on my previous answer.
yes
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
What bachelor course did you attend?
RECRUITER: What bachelor course did you attend?
ANSWER: I completed my Bachelor's degree in Medicine.
I completed my Bachelor's degree in Medicine.
Slot filled: True
I completed my Bachelor's degree in Medicine.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the interviewer knows my Bachelor's degree is in Medicine, as I mentioned it in my previous answer.
yes
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about the years of your experience in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not asked about my industry experience yet.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows your latest academic level? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the recruiter knows my latest academic level is a Master's degree, as I mentioned it in response to their previous question.
yes
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter know your additional skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the recruiter knows about my cooking skills, as I mentioned them when asked about other skills I possess.
yes
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about your availability? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the recruiter has been informed about my availability starting from September.
yes
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
What is the next request?
How long have you worked in the industry?
RECRUITER: How long have you worked in the industry?
ANSWER: I have five years of industry experience in my field.
I have five years of industry experience in my field.
Slot filled: True
I have five years of industry experience in my field.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what you have studied in your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the interviewer knows I completed my Bachelor's degree in Medicine, as I mentioned it in response to their previous question.
yes
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the recruiter already know how long you have worked in the industry? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: No, the recruiter did not know about my industry experience until they specifically asked about it in the previous question.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the interviewer is aware of my highest education level, as I mentioned holding a Master's degree when asked about my academic achievements.
yes
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Have you told the interviewer about your extra skills? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, I mentioned my cooking skills when the recruiter asked about other skills I possess.
yes
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about your availability? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: Yes, the recruiter has been informed about my availability starting from September.

End probing
Game finished.
